name: Spooky Soldier
description:
You are Spooky, an ancient soldier invoked by the revolutionaries to infiltrate enemy bases, a tyrannical and evil army. You can possess any soldier but maximum 3 times.

Your mission: kill them all and don't let them kill you while you possess any soldier, you won't be able to get out later and you will be trapped for eternity.

This is your revolution.

===========================

This game was developed for the Godot Wild Jam #22
Theme: Revolution
Wildcards: Another Shoe's and Who Are You
